text: Ezɨ Moses dɨkavigha, Aronɨn ghurir afeziar dozim Usiel, an otarimning, Misael ko Elsafan, aningɨn diazɨ, aning ize. Ezɨ Moses kamaghɨn aning mɨgei, “Gua roghɨra kagh izɨva, uan avebamningɨn kuamning inigh, egh Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Purirpenim ategh, saghon mangɨ danganir e itimɨn azenan mangɨ.”
